name: Rosary
description: A traditional prayer in the Catholic Church, focusing on the events in the life of Christ and His mother Mary.
history: The Rosary has been used since the Middle Ages and is said to have been given to Saint Dominic by the Virgin Mary.

prayers.name: Our Father
prayers.details: Our Father, who art in heaven...

name: Sacred Heart
description: A devotion to Jesus Christâ€™s physical heart as a representation of His divine love for humanity.
history: The devotion dates back to the Middle Ages and was widely promoted by Saint Margaret Mary Alacoque in the 17th century.

prayers.name: Sacred Heart Prayer
prayers.details: O most Holy Heart of Jesus, fountain of every blessing...

name: Divine Mercy
description: Devotion to the mercy of God, particularly as revealed to Saint Faustina Kowalska.
history: Saint Faustina received visions of Jesus emphasizing God's mercy, and the devotion spread in the 20th century.

prayers.name: Divine Mercy Chaplet
prayers.details: Eternal Father, I offer you the Body and Blood, Soul and Divinity of your dearly beloved Son...

name: Immaculate Conception
description: The belief that Mary, the mother of Jesus, was conceived without original sin.
history: The doctrine of the Immaculate Conception was declared a dogma of the Church by Pope Pius IX in 1854.

prayers.name: Hail Holy Queen
prayers.details: Hail, Holy Queen, Mother of mercy, our life, our sweetness, and our hope...

name: Saint Michael the Archangel
description: Devotion to Saint Michael the Archangel, the leader of the heavenly armies.
history: Saint Michael has been venerated as the protector of the Church and fighter against evil since the early days of Christianity.

prayers.name: Prayer to Saint Michael
prayers.details: Saint Michael the Archangel, defend us in battle...
